product_name: Injinji Yoga-Series Original-Weight Half-Toe Socks - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Injinji Yoga-Series Original-Weight Half-Toe Socks are designed to provide restriction-free movement and protection for your feet during yoga, Pilates, barre and any mat exercise. Slip-resistant grippers hold onto mat for maximum control during poses. CoolMax(R) freshFX(TM) is a CoolMax fabric blend bonded with silver for superior moisture wicking plus anti-odor and antimicrobial properties. Nylon and spandex are added for durability and support. Mid-foot arch support increases stability and eliminates bunching. Precisely stitched heels deter bunching and help provide a comfortable fit and prevent slippage. Double-layered welt top maintains shape for longlasting performance and support. Closeout.
short_description: The Injinji Yoga-Series Original-Weight Half-Toe Socks are designed to provide restriction-free movement and protection for your feet during yoga, Pilates, barre and any mat exercise.
